qas.question: On what date did Foster apply for a patent on arena football?
When did the United States Patent and Trademark Office grant Foster's patent?
On what date was the expiration of Foster's patent?
With whom did Foster file his patent?

answers.text: the United States Patent and Trademark Office

context: On <a0_0>September 30, 1987<a0_0/>, Foster filed an application with <a3_0>the United States Patent and Trademark Office<a3_0/> to patent his invented sport. The patent application covered the rules of the game, specifically detailing the goalposts and rebound netting and their impact on gameplay. Foster's application was granted on <a1_0>March 27, 1990<a1_0/>. The patent expired on <a2_0>September 30, 2007<a2_0/>.
